stories.text: I was wondering if the HN community wants a LinkedIn alternative.  I hear many people complaining that it has become a place for humble bragger. If you were to replace LinkedIn, what would you want it to be?  What to emphasize more or less on?
stories.title: Ask HN: Do people want a LinkedIn alternative?

stories.text: Hi there. I am a young Software engineer who is doing fullstack development and interested in DevOps and Cloud Stuff. I am planning to start my journey in Cloud but before that want to dive into Computer networking topics. Only course I know is Bits and Bytes of Computer Networking in Coursera. Feel free to suggest me any other useful sources/links/websites/courses etc.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to learn Computer networks from 0 to hero
